dialogues: Ebenezer: These pills i found… They belong to you, don’t they?
Grace: A-Ah! Y-you went through my s-stuff?
Ebenezer: I am willing to do whatever it takes to achieve my goal.
Ebenezer: Now do tell me.. these pills…
Ebenezer: They’re quite suspicious, don’t you think?
Ebenezer: A couple pills in a ziplock bag…
Grace: I-I can explain! I- They- They’re medication! I n-need them!
Ebenezer: And where did you get them from?
Ebenezer: You got them from the victim, didn’t you? The lady of the night?
Grace: Ah- Y-yes but! That d-doesn’t have anything to… anything to do with this situation!
Ebenezer: I refuse to believe that.
Grace: I-It helps me stay calm! That- That’s why I have them!
Ebenezer: And what about the payment? You can’t truly afford these, can you?
Ebenezer: But you needed them nonetheless…
Grace: EEP! I s-swear it wasn’t me!
Ebenezer: You knew you couldn’t take care of your son without your medication…
Ebenezer: You needed them no matter the cost
Grace: …
Grace: UAAHHHHH!!!!! IT WASN’T ME! IT WASN’T ME! IT WASN’T ME! IT WASN’T ME!!-
Grace: I W-WOULD NEVER! I NEED TO TAKE CARE OF HIM! I’LL LOSE HIM IF YOU LET THEM TAKE ME AWAY! HE CAN’T- HE CAN’T GO BACK TO HIS WRETCHED FATHER!
Grace: IT WASN’T ME IT WASN’T ME!!!
Ebenezer: ...
Ebenezer: The evidence supports this claim enough.
Ebenezer: It’s over for you.
Grace: …
Grace: You… Y-You are truly H-HORRIBLE!
Grace: One day… Y-you’ll pay for your sins!
